Results.PasswordResetSent: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.

SignIn.title: Login
SignIn.description: Your credentials are needed to access the dashboard. This is required to manage your AI agents, payment settings and view transactions.

SignUp.title: Register
SignUp.description: Create an account to access the dashboard and manage your AI agents, payment settings, and view transactions.
SignUp.name: Name

ForgotPassword.title: Reset Password
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.success: Password reset link sent! Check your email.
ForgotPassword.error: Failed to send password reset email
ForgotPassword.successMessage: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.

checkEmail.title: Check your email
checkEmail.description: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.

ResetPassword.title: Set new password
ResetPassword.error: Failed to reset password. The link may have expired.

pending.title: Identity Verification Required
pending.description: Complete your identity verification to unlock full access to Masumi.

review.title: Verification Under Review
review.description: Your identity verification is being processed. We'll notify you once it's complete.

approved.title: Identity Verified
approved.description: Your identity has been successfully verified.

rejected.title: Verification Rejected
rejected.description: Your verification was rejected. Please review the reason and try again.

Onboarding.title: Identity Verification
Onboarding.description: Complete your identity verification to unlock full access to Masumi.

errors.consentRequired: Please accept the consent to proceed
errors.tokenGenerationFailed: Failed to generate verification token. Please try again.

Intro.purpose: Identity verification is required for compliance and to enable agent monetization features. This helps us maintain trust and security across the platform.
Intro.gdpr: We follow GDPR principles and only collect the minimum data necessary for verification. Your data is processed securely and will be retained according to our privacy policy.
Intro.biometric: The verification process includes biometric checks (selfie and liveness detection) to ensure you are a real person matching your identity documents.
Intro.credential: Upon successful verification, a Veridian credential will be issued to your account. This credential enables you to use advanced features and can be shared with your consent.
Intro.consentLabel: I understand and consent to the identity verification process.

Verification.description: Please complete the verification steps below. You'll need to upload an identity document and take a selfie.
Verification.error: An error occurred during verification. Please try again.

Completion.successMessage: Your verification has been submitted successfully. We'll review it and notify you once it's complete.
Completion.processingMessage: Your verification is being processed. This may take a few moments.
Completion.rejectedMessage: Your verification was rejected. Please review the reason above and try again.

Agents.title: Agents
Agents.description: Manage your AI agents and their verification status.
Agents.noAgents: No agents found. Register your first agent to get started.
Agents.noAgentsMatchingSearch: No agents found matching your search
Agents.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

Register.title: Register New Agent
Register.description: Register a new AI agent to your account.
Register.name: Name
Register.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 250 characters
Register.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 1000 characters
Register.apiUrlInvalid: API URL must be a valid URL
Register.apiUrlProtocol: API URL must start with http:// or https://
Register.error: Failed to register agent. Please try again.

Details.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

pending.title: Verification Pending
pending.description: This agent has not been verified yet. Request verification to issue a credential with your KYC status.

review.title: Verification Under Review
review.description: Your verification request is being processed. This may take a few moments.

approved.title: Agent Verified
approved.description: This agent has been successfully verified with your KYC status.

rejected.title: Verification Rejected
rejected.description: Verification was rejected. You can try requesting verification again.

Verification.requestError: Failed to request verification. Please try again.

Account.title: Account Settings
Account.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

Name.title: Change Name
Name.error: Failed to update name. Please try again.

Email.title: Change Email
Email.success: Email update request sent! Please check your email.
Email.error: Failed to update email. Please try again.
Email.notImplemented: Email change functionality is not yet implemented.
Email.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to change your email from {oldEmail} to {newEmail}? A verification email will be sent to the new address.

Password.title: Change Password
Password.description: Change your password to keep your account secure.
Password.error: Failed to update password. Please try again.

Delete.title: Delete Account
Delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
Delete.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
Delete.error: Failed to delete account. Please check your password and try again.

CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

LogoutModal.title: Do you really want to log out?

ResetPassword.title: Reset your password
ResetPassword.message: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
ResetPassword.linkText: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
ResetPassword.footer: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

Verification.title: Verify your email address
Verification.message: Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
Verification.linkText: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
Verification.footer: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

NotFound.description: This page could not be found.
NotFound.message: The page you're trying to access might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
